biotools.summary: It imports single color (protein) microarray data that has been saved in gpr file format. After preprocessing univariate feature preselection is performed. Subsequently, a multivariate feature selection is conducted to discover biomarker candidates. Thereto, either a frequency-based backwards elimination aproach or ensemble feature selection can be used. It provides a complete toolbox of analysis tools including several different plots for results examination and evaluation.

bioschemas.name: PAA - Protein Array Analyzer
bioschemas.summary: It imports single color (protein) microarray data that has been saved in gpr file format. After preprocessing univariate feature preselection is performed. Subsequently, a multivariate feature selection is conducted to discover biomarker candidates. Thereto, either a frequency-based backwards elimination aproach or ensemble feature selection can be used. It provides a complete toolbox of analysis tools including several different plots for results examination and evaluation.
